name: Children's Music
description: Recorded for an intended audience of children.

sub_genres.name: Fairy Tales
sub_genres.description: Recorded for children with or without background music.

sub_genres.name: Lullabies
sub_genres.description: Soothing, melodic songs that are typically used to help young children sleep.

sub_genres.name: Nursery Rhymes
sub_genres.description: Short, mostly traditional children's songs or poems with simple melodies, rhythms and words.
